name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:

Proficient in **FastAPI**, **React**, and **Python**, leveraging **AWS** services, including **ECS** and **Fargate**, to build cloud-native systems. Expert in implementing **Docker** for containerization and optimizing CI/CD pipelines for rapid deployment.
Skilled in ML and NLP processes, focusing on data processing and model inference APIs to enhance automation and analytics capabilities. Experienced in constructing AI/ML-integrated platforms utilizing techniques for predictive analysis and real-time data processing. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, adhering to standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring secure and reliable solutions.
